langVersion.description: The Go language version to target (e.g., "go1.24", "go1.25"). Must start with "go" prefix. If empty, defaults to "go1".

modulePath.description: The module path of the package being formatted. Used for import sorting. If empty, gofumpt will try to infer it from the go.mod file.

extraRules.description: Enable extra formatting rules beyond the default gofumpt rules. These rules are stricter but may not be desired in all projects.
